src:
Nočna drama prekinila svingersko zabavo! Ne boste verjeli, kaj je bilo z gosti
Zabavo je končalo uhajanje smrtonosnega plina.
04 Nov 2019, 13:16 by T. V.
Zabava v nočnem klubu v Hattingenu na zahodu Nemčije se je v soboto končala okoli 21. ure, ko sta zaradi uhajanja ogljikovega monoksida dva gosta izgubila zavest. Posredovali so gasilci in iz lokala pospremili vse ljudi v njem. Šlo je za svingerski klub, v katerem je bilo okoli 350 gostov, ti pa so morali v spodnjem perilu (nekateri so bili ogrnjeni samo v brisače in kopalne plašče) čakati na cesti pred klubom.Svingerje (ali menjače) so z avtobusi nato odpeljali na zdravniški pregled, osem izmed njih pa je potožilo, da se ne počutijo dobro. Preostalim so dovolili, da se po pregledu vrnejo v klub po svoje stvari, a razvrata je bilo nepreklicno konec.
text:
Nightly drama interrupts the swing party! You will not believe what happened to the guests
The fun was ended by a lethal gas leak.
04 Nov 2019, 12:16 by T.V.
The party at a nightclub in Hattingen in the West of Germany ended around 9pm on Saturday when two guests lost consciousness due to carbon monoxide leakage. Firefighters intervened and escorted all the people inside it. It was a swing club with about 350 guests and they had to wait in the underwear (some of which were only towels and bathrobes) in the street in front of the club. medical examination, and eight of them complained that they were not feeling well. The rest were allowed to return to the club after their inspection, but their fight was irrevocably over.
